message_1: "What is the balanced chemical equation, including state symbols, for the complete combustion of methane (CH4) in oxygen (O2)?"
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the complete combustion of methane (CH₄) in oxygen (O₂) is:

CH₄(g) + 2O₂(g) → CO₂(g) + 2H₂O(g)

Here, (g) represents the gaseous state of the substances.
